title: "Amazon AI techniques improve speech recognition and dialog state tracking"
excerpt: "In a pair of preprint papers published this week on Arxiv.org, Amazon researchers describe two novel systems — one that facilitates automatic speech recognition and another responsible for dialog state tracking — that they say achieve state-of-the-art performance compared with several baseline models. Assuming the claims have merit ..."
